field.name: summary
field.value: RouteContext and Http Method Filtering for PatternRule

field.name: description
field.value:
This patch changes the Routing Interfaces to include a RouteContext which gives access to the IRequest so rules can do more powerful things with matching.
The patch also includes a new feature for PatternRules to allow routing on the HTTP Request Method so restful things can be done easier.
Unzip the the patch.zip in the root Castle Directory to get the new files into the source tree, then apply the patch.
The discussion on the feature can be found on the dev list at: http://groups.google.com/group/castle-project-devel/t/b0d7fc5f87de2b2b
